author: AP
title: Former Fox execs stay free on $15M bond each in soccer case
description: Two former 21st Century Fox executives have been allowed to remain free on $15 million bonds
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Two former 21st Century Fox Inc. executives were allowed to remain free on $15 million appearance bonds, three days after they were indicted as part of the U.S. government’s investigation of soccer corruption.
Hernan Lopez and Carlos Martinez… [+2017 chars]
